title: Ravi Shastri's Cheeky Response After Virat Kohli's 'Use Less Water' Holi Wish Resurfaces - News18
content:
1. Ravi Shastri's Cheeky Response After Virat Kohli's 'Use Less Water' Holi Wish Resurfaces  News18
  2. Holi celebrations across India; PM Modi wishes nation on the occasion of festival of colours | Watch  Hindustan Times
  3. PM Modi, President Kovind & VP Naidu Extend Greetings To Citizens On Holi 2022  ABP Live
  4. ‘Chappalmaar Holi’: Not colours, but slippers took over revelry at Bihar amusement park  The Indian Express

description: In an old video that has resurfaced online, presumbly on the day of Holi, Virat Kohli, Ravi Shastri can be seen seated together in a team bus where the two record messages for their fans celebrating the festival of colours.
